mapper.insert: insert into goods_brand ( id, name, en_name, description, pic, sort_order, status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime )values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{enName}, #{description}, #{pic}, #{sortOrder}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{ctime}, #{modifier}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update goods_brand
id=#{id},
name=#{name},
en_name=#{enName},
description=#{description},
pic=#{pic},
sort_order=#{sortOrder},
status=#{status},
creator=#{creator},
ctime=#{ctime},
modifier=#{modifier},
mtime=#{mtime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, en_name, description, pic, sort_order, status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from goods_brand where id=#{id}
select id, name, en_name, description, pic, sort_order, status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from goods_brand where id=#{id}

select id, name, en_name, description, pic, sort_order, status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime
limit #{offset},#{rows}
